show_name: Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak High School: Future Arc (TV)
other_title: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibōgamine Gakuen: Mirai Hen (Japanese)
ダンガンロンパ3 －The End of 希望ケ峰学園－ 未来編 (Japanese)
plot: Makoto Naegi is under suspicion of treason after shielding a remnant of Despair. The Future Foundation, founded to save the world from chaos caused by Ultimate Despair, gathers to decide his punishment when they are captured by Monokuma. Thrusted into an ultimate death game, they must find the true traitor and kill him if they hope to survive. The tale of despair in which hope kills hope begins.
opening_theme: "DEAD OR LIE" by Maon Kurosaki feat. TRUSTRICK
